sentences: Mõtlesin, et see on hea mõte.
Ta mõtlesin, et ma olen õige.
Me mõtlesime, et see on tore.
context: The word 'mõtlesin' is the first person singular past tense form of the verb 'mõtlema', which means to think or consider something. It is commonly used in Estonian to express thoughts or opinions about a particular topic.
